mapper.insert: INSERT CommitmentDetail (commitmentID, amountPerMonth, paymentDay, startDate, bankID, accountNo, accountHolder, etc) VALUES (#{commitmentID}, #{amountPerMonth}, #{paymentDay}, #{startDate}, #{bankID}, #{accountNo}, #{accountHolder}, #{etc})
mapper.update: UPDATE CommitmentDetail SET amountPerMonth = #{amountPerMonth}, paymentDay = #{paymentDay}, startDate = #{startDate}, bankID = #{bankID}, accountNo = #{accountNo}, accountHolder = #{accountHolder}, etc = #{etc} WHERE ID = #{ID}
